 2020-05682020-08-23,  ,  ESDC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to help make Canada Student Loans more affordable by introducing interest-free and payment-free leave from student loan repayment for up to 18 months for borrowers taking temporary leave from their studies for medical or parental reasons, including mental health leave.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0182 Publication Date: 2020-09-16
AttachmentsAttachment
